statusLine.command: input=$(cat); transcript_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); if [ -f "$transcript_path" ]; then char_count=$(wc -c < "$transcript_path" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); printf "Context: %dk chars | Model: %s | Dir: %s" $((char_count/1000)) "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')" "$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')")"; else printf "Context: ? | Model: %s | Dir: %s" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')" "$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')")"; fi
